""
"  # 當前僅支持nginx的ingress"
"  # 設置`provider: none`從而禁用ingress控制器"
"  # 通過node_selector可以指定在某些節點上運行ingress控制器，例如: "
"     provider: nginx"
"     node_selector:"
"       app: ingress"
rkeConfigComment.network:
""
"  # 如果您在AWS上使用calico"
""
"     network:"
"       plugin: calico"
"       calico_network_provider:"
"         cloud_provider: aws"
""
"  # 指定flannel的網絡接口"
""
"     network:"
"       plugin: flannel"
"       flannel_network_provider:"
"         iface: eth1"
""
"  # 指定canal網絡插件的flannel網絡接口"
""
"     network:"
"       plugin: canal"
"       canal_network_provider:"
"         iface: eth1"
rkeConfigComment.services:
""
" # 自定義服務參數"
"     services:"
"       kube-api:"
"         service_cluster_ip_range: 10.43.0.0/16"
"       kube-controller:"
"         cluster_cidr: 10.42.0.0/16"
"         service_cluster_ip_range: 10.43.0.0/16"
"       kubelet:"
"         cluster_domain: cluster.local"
"         cluster_dns_server: 10.43.0.10"
"         # 擴展變量 "
"         extra_args:"
"           # 修改節點最大Pod數量"
"           max-pods: '250' "
"       etcd:"
"         # 修改空間配額為$((4*1024*1024*1024))，默認2G,最大8G"
"         extra_args:"
"           quota-backend-bytes: '4294967296'"
